user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (sarah@quantuminnovations.com) with his input on the “Quantum Cohesion 2023” retreat, and remind him to check his Gmail and Notion for the relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Input Needed for “Quantum Cohesion 2023” Retreat

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well! Could you please review the materials for our upcoming “Quantum Cohesion 2023” retreat and share your input with me at sarah@quantuminnovations.com when you have a moment?

All of the relevant documents and details are in your Gmail and our Notion workspace, so please check those for reference.

Thanks so much for your help—I appreciate your insights!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:
